about_the_game: "War of the Titans" is an immersive journey into the heart of civilization-building, blending the rich traditions of the 4X strategy genre with dynamic 3D visuals. Players are thrust into the helm of a civilization on the brink of extinction. One of the defining features of "War of the Titans" is the introduction of Titans, legendary god-like entities imprisoned by dark spells. Players can embark on quests to liberate these Titans, harnessing their immense power to turn the tides of battle.

content_descriptors.notes: There is realistic blood during combat. Fantasy violence depicting Humans fighting non human creatures. There is graphic depictions of hunting and killing animals.

detailed_description: "War of the Titans" is an immersive journey into the heart of civilization-building, blending the rich traditions of the 4X strategy genre with dynamic 3D visuals. name: War Of The Titans

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8GHz / AMD Phenom II X4 945 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti 2GB / AMD Radeon HD 7870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Your people have been driven from their homeland by war. The elders speak of an ancient land where gods and men lived as one. After months at sea you land on a mysterious island that the elders believe is your ancient homeland. Rebuild your civilization, and uncover the secrets of your ancestors.
